text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump #DearMrPresident @POTUS the @FBI needs to investigate you and @VP @WhiteHouse for allowing #USA citizens to die of #COVID19 #CaptainCrozier obviously wanted to document in writing because who can trust this administration #FailureInChief https://t.co/jQ2caKKhWj
